663:1: atha bhagavāṃ śākyamuniḥ punarapi śuddhāvāsabhavanamavalokya mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma |
663:2: asti mañjuśrīḥ ! tvadīye kalpavidhānaparivarte saptamaḥ paṭakarmavidhānaṃ yo tasmiṃ kāle tasmiṃ samaye yugānte sādhayiṣyanti amoghā tasya siddhirbhaviṣyati |
663:3: saphalāḥ sukhodayāḥ sukhavipākāḥ dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyā sarvadurgatinivāraṇīyā niyataṃ tasya bodhiparāyaṇīyā siddhirbhaviṣyati ||
663:4: atha bhagavāṃ śākyamuniḥ mañjuśriyasya kumārabhūtasya hṛdayaṃ bhāṣate sma ||
663:15: śākayāvakabhikṣabhaikṣāhāro vā triḥkālasnāyī tricelaparivarttī akṣaralakṣaṃ japet |
663:17: tataḥ acchinnāgradaśake paṭe poṣadhikena citrakareṇa aśleṣakairvarṇakaiḥ āryamañjuśrīścitrāpayitavyaḥ padmāsanasyo dharmaṃ deśayamānaḥ sarvālaṅkāravibhūṣitaḥ kumārarūpī muktottarāsaṅgaḥ tasya vāmena āryāvalokiteśvaraḥ padmahastaḥ cāmaravyagrahastaḥ dakṣiṇena āryasamantabhadraḥ upari meghagarbhavinirgatau vidyādharau mālādhāriṇau likhāpayitavyau adhastāt sādhako dhūpakaṭacchakavyagrahastaḥ samantāt parvataśikharā likhāpayitavyā |
663:19: sadhātuke caitye paṭaṃ paścānmukhaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya udārāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā ghṛtapradīpāṃśca prajvālya jātīpuṣpāṇāṃ aṣṭasahasreṇa ekaikamabhimantrya mañjuśrīmukhe tāḍayet |
663:27: agarusamidhānāmadhyarddhamaṅgulapramāṇānāṃ nirdhūmeṣu khadirāṅgāreṣu kṛtsnāṃ rātriṃ turuṣkatailāktānāṃ juhuyāt |
663:31: tasyaiva paṭasyāgrataḥ candanadhūpamavyavacchinnaṃ dahaṃ kṛtsnāṃ rātriṃ japet |
663:32: tataḥ āryamañjuśrīḥ sākṣāmāgacchati gambhīrāṃ dharmāṃ deśayati |
663:35: raktacandanamayaṃ padmaṃ kṛtvā ṣaḍaṅgulapariṇāhaṃ sanālaṃ raktacandanena mrakṣayitvā sahasraṃ sampātāhutaṃ sahasrābhimantritaṃ kṛtvā pūrṇamāsyāṃ paṭasyāgrataḥ padmapatre sthāpya hastenāvaṣṭabhya tāvajjaped yāvat prajvalita iti |
663:36: tena gṛhītena dviraṣṭavarṣākṛtiḥ taptakāñcanaprabhaḥ bhāskarasyopiraketejā devakumāraḥ sarvavidyādharanamaskṛtaḥ mahākalpaṃ jīvati |
663:38: candragrahe śvetavacāṃ gṛhyaṃ pañcagavyena prakṣālya aśvatthapatrairavaṣṭambhayitvā tāvajjaped yāvadūṣmāyati dhūmāyati jvalati |
663:39: sarvajanavaśīkaraṇaḥ sarvavādivijayī dhūmāyamāne antarddhānaṃ triṃśadvarṣasahasrāṇi jīvati |
663:41: kapilāyāḥ samānavatsāyāḥ ghṛtaṃ gṛhya tāmrabhājanaṃ saptabhiraśvatthapatraiḥ sthāpya tāvajjaped yāvat trividhā siddhiriti |
663:43: puṣkarabījaṃ mukhe prakṣipya candragrahe tāvajjaped yāvacculuculāyati |
663:49: bhikṣāhāraḥ kāṣṭhamaunī lakṣaṃ jape antarhito bhavati |
663:50: koṭiṃ japedāryamañjuśrīstathā dharmaṃ deśayati yathā caramabhaviko bodhisattvaḥ bhavati |
663:52: sarvagandhairyasya pratikṛtiṃ kṛtvā cchitvā juhoti sa saptarātreṇa vaśyo bhavati |
663:53: guggulugulikānāṃ badarāsthipramāṇānāṃ ghṛtāktānāṃ śatasahasraṃ juhuyāt dīnāralakṣaṃ labhati ||
663:70: niyatavedanīyaṃ karma kṣapayati athāṣṭaśatajapena maraṇakālasamaye samastaṃ sammukhaṃ āryamañjuśriyaṃ paśyatīti ||
